title: Tips for Buying the Best Macbook Pro
summary: The 13-inch Macbook Pro is the most popular version, and the one we would recommend to most people. It's not the most powerful, but it’s powerful enough for most people, and it's great for everyday use. The 15-inch version is the best option for people who need more power. The Touch Bar is only available with a Touch Bar, so if you don’t need it, you need to go with the 15-in version. The 17-inch model is the biggest, with a battery life of up to 10 hours, and is great for watching movies and TV shows. It comes in both the 13-in and the Touch Bar version.

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...e}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...e,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`The MacBook Pro is one of the most popular laptops on the market, and they\u2019re great machines. But with so many different versions to choose from, it can be difficult to know which one is right for you. Do you need a Touch Bar or not? What screen size do you need? How much storage space do you need? These are all questions you need to ask yourself before buying a Macbook Pro.
If you\u2019re thinking about buying a Macbook Pro, here are some helpful tips to make sure you get the best model for your needs. The Macbook Pro comes in 13-inch, 15-inch and 17-inch screens, so that\u2019s the first thing to consider when buying one. You also want to decide whether you need an integrated GPU (not all models have them) and how much storage space you want.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

content.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("h2",null,"13-inch Screen Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The 13-inch Macbook Pro is the most popular version, and the one we would recommend to most people. It\u2019s compact and lightweight, making it easy to carry around. It\u2019s also the cheapest option, making it a great choice if you\u2019re on a budget. It\u2019s a great laptop for running multiple programs at once, with 8 GB RAM and a 256 GB SSD, and if you\u2019re a student or someone who travels a lot, this is the one we would recommend. It\u2019s not the most powerful laptop, but it\u2019s powerful enough for most people, and it\u2019s great for everyday use. It\u2019s the most reliable version too, so it\u2019s definitely worth considering if you\u2019re after a Macbook Pro."),mdx("h2",null,"15-inch Screen Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The 15-inch Macbook Pro is the best version for people who need more power. It\u2019s a more heavyweight option, but it\u2019s great if you run heavy programs like photo editing, video editing or if you\u2019re a designer. The bigger screen size is also great for watching movies and TV shows, so if you\u2019re an avid TV binger, this one is a good option. One thing to note is that the 15-inch Macbook Pro is only available with a Touch Bar, so if you don\u2019t need a Touch Bar, it\u2019s not worth the extra money. It\u2019s also a more expensive option, so it\u2019s worth considering if you really need a more powerful laptop. It\u2019s a great option for people who run programming, design or video editing software regularly."),mdx("h2",null,"17-inch Screen Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The 17-inch Macbook Pro is the best option for people who need a laptop for work. It\u2019s the most powerful option out of the Macbook Pros, as it has two fans to keep the laptop cool, and a giant battery life of up to 10 hours. It\u2019s also the biggest, so if portability is important to you, it\u2019s definitely worth avoiding. That said, it\u2019s the best option for people who need their laptop to run multiple programs at once, making it the best option for people who work regularly on the go."),mdx("p",null,"It\u2019s worth noting that it comes with an IGP instead of a discrete GPU, so it\u2019s not the best option for editing videos or running graphic design software. If you need a laptop for work, this is the best option, but it\u2019s worth considering if you want something more portable."),mdx("h2",null,"Touch Bar Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The Touch Bar Macbook Pro comes in both the 15-inch and the 13-inch version and costs a little more than the non-Touch Bar version. It\u2019s also worth noting that the 13-inch model is lighter and more compact than the 15-inch model, so if portability is important to you, it\u2019s worth considering. It\u2019s a good option for people who want to use the Macbook Pro for everyday tasks, and don\u2019t need a laptop for work. It\u2019s definitely worth considering if you want a cheap Macbook Pro, but it\u2019s worth being aware that you won\u2019t get the best performance out of the three."),mdx("h2",null,"Storage Space and RAM in the Macbook Pro"),mdx("p",null,"The Macbook Pro comes with either 128 GB, 256 GB, 512 GB or 1 TB of storage space, so if storage space is important to you, it\u2019s worth considering how much you need. 128 GB is the minimum amount of storage space needed, but if you\u2019re someone who likes to store a lot on their laptop, or if you need to regularly store files, it\u2019s worth going for the 256 GB or 512 GB option."),mdx("p",null,"The Macbook Pro also comes with 8 GB or 16 GB of RAM, so if you need more than 8 GB, it\u2019s worth considering the 16 GB option. relatedArticles.title: Google's Monopoly: How the Tech Giant Controls Our Lives
The Future of Work: Automation and the Rise of the Robots

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"Digital transformation is a sweeping trend that is reshaping businesses. The role of technology has shifted from being a support system to something that drives competitiveness and customer experience. In the new digital economy, businesses must focus on how technology can transform their current services and operations to meet the needs of their customers. The combination of artificial intelligence (AI) and robots are transforming the way we work \u2014 especially in manufacturing and logistics operations. Automation and robotics have made it possible for manufacturers to produce more goods with fewer workers, while increasing production efficiency and accuracy at the same time. These technologies are also reducing labor costs, increasing output, and easing recruitment challenges that many manufacturers face in developing countries where youth unemployment remains high. But how will this impact work in factories change? Let\u2019s explore the future of work: automation and robots"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Best Smartphones of 2022: What to Buy and Why

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Smartphone technology is constantly evolving, and the best smartphones of 2022 will be much different than even the most cutting-edge devices of today. These innovations won\u2019t just be incremental improvements on the features we take for granted right now; they will be game-changing changes that make a big difference in how we use our phones.
Today\u2019s best smartphones are fast and powerful, with high resolution cameras, long battery life, crisp displays and more. But by 2022, these devices may seem almost Stone Age in comparison to what comes after them. Read on to learn about some of the biggest upcoming changes in smartphone tech, along with details about which models you should consider buying if you\u2019re shopping for a new phone in 2022.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Importance of Artificial Intelligence in Marketing: Should You Be Doing It?
Getting the Most Out of Your Smartphone: Tips and Tricks

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:o,...e}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...e,components:o,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Smartphones can do a lot more than most people think. Those tiny devices packed with a dizzying array of features are also virtual Swiss Army knives, able to adapt to almost any situation. That\u2019s because your phone is actually an \u201Cintelligent\u201D device, as opposed to just being another way to check email or browse social media. Smartphones have the ability to learn and grow based on your usage habits, which means that if you know what you\u2019re doing, your phone can do even more than you think.
In this post, we will share some tips and tricks that will help you get the most out of your smartphone. Keeping reading for useful advice on how to use your smartphone more efficiently, how to store photos properly so they take up less space on your device, how to download apps that won\u2019t chew up memory unnecessarily and many other helpful tricks you didn\u2019t know about!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: 3 Reasons Why Your Macbook Pro May Be Lying to You

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"In recent years, Apple has become known for its beautiful designs and attention to detail. This is particularly true of the company\u2019s laptop offerings, like the MacBook Pro. These computers are sleek, powerful, and packed with features that make them stand out from their Windows-based competitors. But as great as these features may be on paper, not all Macbook Pros are created equal. Even if you get a high-end model with all of the bells and whisters that you want and need, it won\u2019t last forever. Even the sturdiest of laptops will break down eventually. What\u2019s important is how well equipped you are to handle these breakdowns when they happen. If your computer starts acting weird or giving you red flags about its performance, it\u2019s probably time to take action sooner rather than later. Here are 3 reasons why your Macbook Pro may be lying to you:"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: Top 12 Amazingly Low-Cost Macbook Pro Alternatives
Your Guide to the Best Smartphone for Your Budget

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Smartphones have become an essential part of our lives. We use them for a lot more than just making calls or sending texts. Smartphones are useful for staying in touch with friends and family, for browsing the internet, for checking your email, and for keeping track of appointments.
They\u2019re also useful for streaming music, taking photos and videos, storing documents you need to access on the go, and keeping track of your fitness goals by monitoring your steps taken and calories burned.
With so many different smartphone manufacturers and models out there it can be hard to know which one is right for you. Do you want a high end phone with all the bells and whistles? Or would a cheaper option suit your needs just fine?
If you\u2019re looking to buy a new smartphone in 2019 but aren\u2019t sure where to start, read on to discover our guide to the best smartphones in 2019, broken down by budget.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

The Macbook Pro is a computer that has been iterated on for many years now. It is also a computer that has gained popularity for being the go-to laptop for video editors and other professionals who rely on the performance of their computer when it comes to editing video or images, like photographers. This article will go into detail about some of the most common mistakes Macbook Pro owners make with their machine and how you can avoid making these same mistakes yourself if you own one.
With so many different versions of the Macbook Pro available on the market right now, it\u2019s easy to get confused about which features you need as an owner of this device and which ones you don\u2019t.
